Extra Longevity: May live an additional 200 years
Hibernate: May enter an ageless hibernation
Vigorous Health: Has full health and vigor
Wilderness Movement: May move through undergrowth at full speed, leaving no trace

Poison Immunity: Immune to natural poisons

Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 8; D2: 6; D3: 6; D4: 6; D5: 5; D6: 4; D7: 3
Spells:
Animal Summoning II (D5 Conj): R1200' Calls 6 8 HD or 12 4 HD animals to assist self
Anti-Animal Shell (D6 Abju): 10' radius blocks animal matter for 20 tn
Barkskin (D2 Alte): Touched gains -1 Armor Class and +1 non-spell saves for 24 rd
Call Lightning (D3 Alte): R360' Clouds release a 10' bolt that inflicts 22d8 HP (Save half) 1/tn for 20 tn
Call Woodland Beings (D4 Conj): R960' Summons forest denizens to assist self (Save -4 neg)
Chariot Of Sustarre (D7 Evoc): R10' Creates a flaming chariot and horse pair (each Armor Class 2, HP 30) that drives self and 8 others 240'/rd or flies 480'/rd for 26 tn
Charm Person Or Mammal (D2 Ench): R80' Target treats self as a trusted friend (Save neg)
Commune With Nature (D5 Divi): Self learns nature info about surrounding 10 mile radius
Conjure Fire Elemental (D6 Conj): R80' Summons a 16 HD elemental that assists self for 20 tn (Reverse dismisses)
Control Temperature 10' Radius (D4 Alte): 1
Control Weather (D7 Alte): Controls the precipitation, temperature, and wind within 4d8 sq miles for 8d12 hr
Cure Disease (D3 Necr): Touched recovers from disease (Reverse infects; Save neg)
Cure Light Wounds (D2 Necr): Touched regains 1d8 HP (Reverse inflicts)
Dispel Magic (D4 Abju): R80' Extinguishes magic in a 800' cu (50% chance each effect +5%/-2% per caster level difference)
Entangle (D1 Alte): R80' Plants in a 20' radius immobilize passers (Save half movement) for 1 tn
Faerie Fire (D1 Alte): R80' Outlines 20 targets in light, giving foes +2 attack, for 80 rd
Feeblemind (D6 Ench): R160' Reduces target Intelligence to 2 (Save Cleric +1, Druid -1, MU -4, Illusionist -5, non-human -2 neg)
Feign Death (D2 Necr): R10' Willing target appears dead, takes half damage, and gains immunity to draining for 44 rd
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R160' Fire in a 400' cu inflicts 2d8 HP (Save half) for 1 rd (Reverse extinguishes)
Hold Plant (D4 Ench): R80' Immobilizes plants in 4-16 sq yd for 20 rd (Save neg)
Invisibility To Animals (D1 Alte): Touched cannot be detected by animals for 30 rd
Locate Animals (D1 Divi): Self discerns animals in a 20'x400' path for 20 rd
Locate Plants (D2 Divi): Self discerns plants in a 100' radius for 20 tn
Pass Plant (D5 Alte): Allows self to teleport up to 600 yd between trees of the same species
Plant Door (D4 Alte): Allows self to move effortlessly through vegetation for 20 tn
Plant Growth (D3 Alte): R160' Vegetation in a 400' sq becomes thick and entangled
Predict Weather (D1 Divi): Forecasts weather in a 9 sq mile area for the next 40 hr
Protection From Lightning (D4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal lightning and +4 saves and half damage from magical lightning (immunity to magical lightning if cast on self) for 240 HP
Purify Water (D1 Alte): R40' Decontaminates (Reverse contaminates) 20' cu water
Pyrotechnics (D3 Alte): R160' Target fire emits fireworks (inflicts blindness for 1d4+1 rd in a 120' radius) or obscuring smoke
Shillelagh (D1 Alte): Touched club gains +1 attack and inflicts 2d4 HP for 20 rd
Snare (D3 Ench): Touched snare becomes 90% undetectable until triggered
Speak With Animals (D1 Alte): R40' Allows self to converse w/chosen type of animal for 40 rd
Sticks To Snakes (D5 Alte): R40' Transforms 20 sticks in a 10' cu to snakes (100% venomous) (Reverse transforms snakes to sticks) for 40 rd
Stone Shape (D3 Alte): Reshapes 23' cu of stone
Wall Of Fire (D5 Evoc): R80' Creates a 400' sq wall that inflicts 4d4+20 HP to passers, 2d4 HP to creatures w/in 10', and 1d4 to creatures w/in 20', for conc or 20 rd
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R80' Creates briars in a 2000' cu that inflict 8+Armor Class HP for 20 tn
Warp Wood (D2 Alte): R200' Bends a 20"x300" wooden item
Magic Notes:
Bonus Spells: Spell level D1x2
Alter Appearance: May alter apparent age, height, weight, and facial features 1/seg
Planar Travel: May move to Planes of Earth, Fire, Water, Air 1/dy
Shapeshift: May change into a natural animal, regaining 1d6x10% HP, 3/dy
Summon Elemental: May conjure a water, air, magma, smoke, ice, ooze elemental 1/dy
